channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Being Addicted To Generative AI
item.description: Believe it or not, people can become addicted to generative AI. It is a serious topic and an emerging one. Here's the scoop.

item.title: The missing file
item.description: It contained some of my best writing. Cogent, clear and powerful. I found it. It wasn’t nearly as good as I remembered. In fact, it was hardly useful....

item.title: Waymo Has $5 Billion, Google AI And Super Fans: Can Amazon, Tesla And Uber Compete
item.description: A look at Waymo by the numbers and the competitive landscape for robotaxis as autonomous ride-hailing becomes ubiquitous across US cities.

item.title: Knowing your customers
item.description: In the very small business, the freelancer knows each customer. By name, by volume, by preferences. And in the huge business, expensive software, data...

item.title: One Icy Boy Made Me Love ‘Deadlock’ But It Still Needs A Lot Of Work
item.description: Valve has finally lifted the lid on Deadlock, but after playing for some time I almost wish they had waited just a bit longer before showing it off pu...

item.title: Anonymity and Bugs Bunny
item.description: I came across this (ironically) anonymous quote recently: “The offline world is full of sticks, but the internet only has carrots.” When we come toget...

item.title: WWE Smackdown: New Bash In Berlin Match As German PLE Takes Shape
item.description: After a table-setting episode of Smackdown on Friday, the WWE has locked in at least one new match for the Bash in Berlin PLE.

item.title: Non-professional writers
item.description: Nobody asks you to design a bridge, write a sonnet or do open heart surgery. We leave these essential tasks to trained professionals. But many job des...

item.title: Environmental Health and the Kennedy-Trump Alliance
item.description: There just might be some substance to the environmental health aspects of this unlikely “team of rivals” in the Kennedy-Trump alliance

item.title: The prevailing conditions
item.description: It doesn’t matter how hard you try, you’re not going to change the direction of the wind. That doesn’t mean you can’t get good at sailing, though. And...
